Subskills.name: Shadow Shuriken
Subskills.description: Throw a single big shuriken dealing increased damage, stunning and returning to you. If re-casted while shuriken exists, teleport to the shurikens position throwing smaller shurikens in all directions.

Subskills.name: Twin Shurikens
Subskills.description: Throw additional shurikens with increased mana cost.

Subskills.name: Shady Trickster
Subskills.description: While standing in smoke bomb thrown shurikens grant you a brief moment of invisibility and increased dodge chance.

Subskills.name: Starstruck
Subskills.description: Chance on critical strikes to split shurikens into smaller shurikens in a cone behind the target.

Subskills.name: Empowering Shurikens
Subskills.description: Chance on hit to increase your attack speed and attack damage for a short duration.

Subskills.name: Slicing Ricochet
Subskills.description: Shurikens now ricochet from monster hits and terrain inflicting bleeding on hit.

Subskills.name: Sharp stars
Subskills.description: Increases critical strike damage dealt by shurikens.

Subskills.name: Throwing Profiency
Subskills.description: Increases attack rating while wielding a throwing weapon.

Subskills.name: Manainfused Shurikens
Subskills.description: Increases the damage dealt by shurikens according to mana spent.

Subskills.name: Cutting Field
Subskills.description: Shurikens now stop mid air and float for a short period and explode into sharp metal shrapnel around it dealing damage and slowing on hit.

Subskills.name: Ripping Flesh
Subskills.description: Shurikens now attach to monsters on hit and are ripped off back to the samurai after a short period or if the samurai moves far away enough. Shuriken throw now has a cooldown.
